data.eml:eml: A new solitary, interstitial species of Loxosomatidae (Entoprocta) from the coast of Galicia (NW Spain), Loxosoma discoides n. sp.

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Roldán, Carmen, Villalba, Antonio, Viéitez, José M. (2019): A new solitary, interstitial species of Loxosomatidae (Entoprocta) from the coast of Galicia (NW Spain), Loxosoma discoides n. sp. Zootaxa 4604 (2): 388-394, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4604.2.11
